title: Bug 12329[Cell Editors] Request:ComboBoxCellEditor READONLY style
description: Bug 12329[Cell Editors] Request:ComboBoxCellEditor READONLY style Although CCombo accepts SWT.READONLY style, there is no way to specify stylewhen it is used in ComboBoxCellEditor.How about adding createControl(Composite parent, int style) method toComboBoxCellEditor class?
